story-context.story_title: Ensure WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance for Frontend

user_story.i_want: to ensure the web interface adheres to WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards
user_story.so_that: the chatbot is usable by individuals with disabilities

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Automated accessibility audit must return zero "critical" or "serious" violations.
All interactive elements must be fully navigable with keyboard alone.
Screen readers must correctly announce all dynamic content.
Text and interactive elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

tasks.task: Set up automated accessibility testing tools

doc.title: Epic 5 Tech Spec
doc.snippet: WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance: Dev -> UIComponents -> A11yTools (Audit) -> Remediate -> Manual Testing.

constraints.constraint: Testing Pattern: Integrate `jest-axe` into unit tests.

tests.standard: Automated accessibility scans. Manual screen reader testing.
